title: The Atlantic community: introducing Denmark
creator_credit: Nordisk Films Kompagni, North Atlantic Treaty Organization, Ove Sevel and Soren Melson
brief_description: Describes the country and the people of Denmark - geographical features, historical development and achievements, economic life, occupations of the people, and social customs. Explains the role of Denmark in NATO.
